programme.title: Out of the Cage - Tom Theocharis
programme.sub-title: Out of the Cage - Tom Theocharis
programme.desc: Out of the Cage reveals the private thoughts and emotions of an MMA fighter, the ambition that drives them and how they are affected when encountering defeat or facing triumph. Featuring Tom Theocharis at HK50

programme.title: Day in the Life of a Coach - Todd Johnston
programme.sub-title: Day in the Life of a Coach - Todd Johnston
programme.desc: Todd Johnston was a well known competitor in Martial Arts, and has since devoted his time to helping other aspiring fighters achieve their goals. Under Todd's tutelage, several Hard Knocks fighters have gone above and beyond what they set out to accomplish.

programme.desc: A private pre-season event held in a secret warehouse in Budapest, Hungary, the inaugural Karate Combat: Genesis event took place on February 3, 2018.
